2-john2coOAF2dByWwsL1S10.text: The Elder, Unto the elect lady and her children, whom I love in the truth, and not I only, but also all those who have known the truth,

2-john2coOAF2dByWwsL1S11.text: for the truthâ€™s sake, which dwelleth in us and shall be with us for ever:

2-john2coOAF2dByWwsL1S12.text: Grace, mercy, and peace be with you from God the Father and from the Lord Jesus Christ, the Son of the Father, in truth and love.

2-john2coOAF2dByWwsL1S13.text: I rejoiced greatly that I have found of thy children walking in truth, as we have received a commandment from the Father.

2-john2coOAF2dByWwsL1S14.text: And now I beseech thee, lady, not as though I wrote a new commandment unto thee, but that which we had from the beginning: that we love one another.

2-john2coOAF2dByWwsL1S15.text: And this is love: that we walk according to His commandments. This is the commandment, that, as ye have heard from the beginning, ye should walk in it.

2-john2coOAF2dByWwsL1S16.text: For many deceivers have entered into the world who confess not that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh. This is a deceiver and an antichrist.

2-john2coOAF2dByWwsL1S17.text: Look to yourselves, that we lose not those things which we have wrought, but that we may receive a full reward.

2-john2coOAF2dByWwsL1S18.text: Whosoever transgresseth, and abideth not in the doctrine of Christ, hath not God. He that abideth in the doctrine of Christ hath both the Father and the Son.

2-john2coOAF2dByWwsL1S19.text: If there come any unto you and bring not this doctrine, receive him not into your house, neither bid him Godspeed;

2-john2coOAF2dByWwsL1S110.text: for he that biddeth him Godspeed is a partaker of his evil deeds.

2-john2coOAF2dByWwsL1S111.text: Having many things to write unto you, I would not write with paper and ink; but I trust to come unto you and speak face to face, that our joy may be full.

2-john2coOAF2dByWwsL1S112.text: The children of thy elect sister greet thee. Amen.
